mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_NO as cartNo, C.MEMBER_NO as memberNo, C.PRODUCT_NO as productNo, C.PRODUCT_AMOUNT as productAmount, C.PRODUCT_PRICE as productPrice, M2.MEMBER_NICKNAME as sellerNickname, P.RECIPE_NO as recipeNo, P.MILKIT_NAME as milkitName, P.MILKIT_PRICE as milkitPrice, P.FILEPATH as productFilepath FROM CART C JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO=C.MEMBER_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_NO=C.PRODUCT_NO JOIN MEMBER M2 ON M2.MEMBER_NO=P.MILKIT_WRITER WHERE P.MILKIT_DELETE=1 AND P.MILKIT_STOCK>0 AND M.MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} ORDER BY C.CART_NO
mapper.update: update cart set product_amount=#{productAmount}, product_price=#{productPrice} where cart_no=#{cartNo}
mapper.select: SELECT MILKIT_STOCK AS stock FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO=#{productNo}
